report.title: Stepping Outside the Cosmic Bubble
report.author: Raoul Duke
report.bodytext: inhaled /n waited. /n /n how much time had pass? /n /n HOLYFUCKINGCHRISTALMGIHTYDONTPULLMETHATFAST! /n screaming fury /n a roar all around /n /n got me a moving; ohhohoho /n o man; here we gogogogo go /n /n -hold on little one /n lead me sally /n -that i will /n /n the field of vision; dark /n twenty seconds.. /n errupting color /n the emptyness, /n sparkeles to life /n vibrant fucking life /n /n tunnels; tunnels errupting everywhere /n intertwining vines; /n mirror images; /n so many vines? /n so many patterns... /n they shoot back, back into infinity /n these numbers know no bounderies... /n they hold no limits /n that i see; which i have sought /n there the bending tree /n times; howmany times? it etched backwards /n this bending tree; /n fire; ablaze in glory /n greens; strange hues; strange sensations... /n /n voices all around; whispers of here and there /n discussing the anywho's /n the what nots of life /n /n patterns; decending upon me /n at terriable speed and unstopable furry /n the end of the tunnel /n breakthrough.. /n /n hyperspace. /n /n ITS BREEDING?! /n HOLY JESUS im feeding it /n no use stopping /n no one can stop it /n /n 'you cant stop me you cant stop me you cant stop me' /n I dont want to /n 'follow me follow me follow me' /n down the winding winding path /n /n what is this that i see? /n strange reality; /n purple; colors; entities have come /n I float through a field /n strange vibes /n strange glows /n time; its as existant as a one dimentional object /n /n ahah ; there we have it; two sides of the circle; a floating syphony of elves /n and throbbing orbs /n /n still I ascend to heights /n I had no intention of reaching /n an all to familiar sensation.. /n splicing /n /n my feet; miles away /n me torso; segmented beyond belief /n cakleling laughter: YOU CANT STOP IT /n no; your right; I cant stop it /n I merely hold on /n this hurricane of exotic chemicals /n unleashed upon my head; /n /n how long has it been? /n that concept has merely faded /n /n then the true contacct was made; /n the one that i was ment to see /n the thing i was ment to behold /n I had come /n the pullsing edge of DMT hyperspace /n so near; the vaulting speed of lady ska /n so strong. /n pushing; pushing /n if i was already in hyperspace? /n where was this place i was going to? /n /n memory fades... /n there is no level /n no single analogy /n that will ever mark; that will ever come close to /n retelling this lizard Kingdome /n this Kingdome come; /n this realm of two worlds /n /n fabric; the fabric tears /n sickening shudders /n violent shakes /n tunnels; i continue down more and more /n elves; fucking elves /n they cant keep their fucking pants on /n erotic fucks... /n I love it /n /n merging with space /n no refriderators... /n this is /n far more... /n galactic proportions /n cosmic visions /n /n before me stands a temple /n infinitely high /n infinitely large /n climbing up it /n lizards; of varying color /n I travel around it; warping /n pulsating beats /n are those drums I hear? /n /n BOOMSHAKLAKA MOTHERFUCKER NO TURNING BACK /n conversations /n misty conversations; sweep upon me; sweet familiarity /n fearful alieniess /n is that a word? /n what is a word? /n logos? /n what are those? /n Christ; spinning and spinning /n /n colors. /n /n vibrant colors /n /n odd de ja vu /n familiarity /n I am meeting an old friend; how about some tea? /n no tea tonight /n no rest for those who test the limits /n what are the limits? /n the end; ahaha; no concept of an end /n circling this ancient structure /n I am content on /n simply completing my orbit; round /n and round the merrygoround /n then we all fall down. /n down? /n /n viscious speed /n /n decending into the structure /n throbbing masses /n entangled patterns /n I see Mayan symbols /n cosmically huge patterns /n they rotate /n to my left a smelve (smelve? aha; he is built of DMT likes; ska personality; freindly; benignly watching me) /n he points /n I look /n the patterns before my field of vision /n begin to extend backwards /n and backwards /n mirror images /n then a kaleidoscope of colors /n rotating inwards /n jumping glee /n euphoria. /n /n then it turns. /n jesus fuck; how long has it been?! /n lady ska departs; slowly; notcibly /n familiar DMT patterns /n familiar DMT entities /n a purple room; I stare through tinted glass /n inside are desks with knobs /n and things i dont remember /n mirror images extend backwards.... /n /n how long has it been!?!?!?!??!!? /n /n blackout /n /n why do we throw it all away? /n /n Conclusion: /n I blacked out after 10 minutes according to my sitter. /n The Salvia never left; the point where I begin to feel as though its presence is leaving is marked by the arrival of a Level Six in combination with a truly magnificent dosage of DMT. I simply forgot I was on drugs. Therefore I merged with the high and accepted it as my eternal state of mind. /n /n This trip did not teach me anything; it did not open up any new insights into life. What it did was take my mind so far past the limits to places never before imagined. This was a psychic journey in a literal sense. I wasn't out to find any answers; I was merely an explorer. And that is exactly what I did. /n /n Unimaginably intense. /n /n The trip itself rivaled that of le Belladonna.
